definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: The hydration mechanism of matrix materials adulterated admixtures was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了掺入外加剂后基体材料的水化机理。

sentences.english: The Application of concrete admixtures is more and more with the development building trades.
sentences.chinese: 随着建筑行业的发展，砼外加剂应用也越来越多。

sentences.english: The cement and admixture of the same manufacturer shall be used for the same structure.
sentences.chinese: 结构物所用的水泥及外加剂宜采用同一厂家产品。

sentences.english: The volume can be confirmed by curve of setting time and electrokinetic potential relation.
sentences.chinese: 外加剂的掺量可由凝结时间一电动电位曲线确定。

sentences.english: The mechanisms of the selected admixtures and limestone powder are discussed as well.
sentences.chinese: 还对所选用的外加剂和填充料的作用机理进行了解释。

sentences.english: The compressive strength of concrete improves a lot when mixed with magnetic treated admixtures.
sentences.chinese: 磁化处理外加剂对混凝土抗压强度有相当的提高。

sentences.english: To improve properties of magnesite material it is imperative to use additives for modification.
sentences.chinese: 提高菱镁质材料性能必须采用外加剂改性。

sentences.english: Action mechanism of admixtures for pressed silicated concrete products is dissected in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了外加剂在压制硅酸盐混凝土中的作用机理。

sentences.english: Is specialized in producing all types of concrete admixture of high-tech enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 是专业生产各类型混凝土外加剂的高新技术企业。

definition: aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
